sentences.sContent: Ellen had to admit the gamble had paid off (= succeeded ).
sentences.sCn: 埃伦不得不承认这一次赌赢了。

sentences.sContent: It was wrong to gamble with our children's future.
sentences.sCn: 拿孩子们的未来冒险是错误的。

synos.tran: 赌博；孤注一掷；投机；打赌
赌博；孤注一掷；冒险假设

hwds.w: put all one's eggs in one basket

remMethod.val: gamb(看作game， 游戏) ＋ le(小) → 赌博可不只是小小的游戏 → 赌博；冒险

trans.tranOther: an action that you take when you know there is a risk but when you hope that the result will be a success
to risk losing sth in the hope of being successful
